languages.text: "Я говорил, что мне нужно отыскать беглецов моего кабала... небольшая плата за привилегию пиршеств со мной". {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Я так и не увидел отдачи за то, что давал тебе".

"I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."
languages.original_text: "Я говорил, что мне нужно отыскать беглецов моего кабала... небольшая плата за привилегию пиршеств со мной". {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Я так и не увидел отдачи за то, что давал тебе".

traits.locale_text: "I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."

"I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."

"I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."

"I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."

languages.text: “我告诉过你，我打算追查那些从我的阴谋团中逃跑的叛徒……我本以为，既然你打算与我共赴盛宴，这不过是个小小的代价。”{n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我把一切都给了你，可你却什么都没给我。”
languages.original_text: "I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."

traits.locale_text: “我告诉过你，我打算追查那些从我的阴谋团中逃跑的叛徒……我本以为，既然你打算与我共赴盛宴，这不过是个小小的代价。”{n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我把一切都给了你，可你却什么都没给我。”

languages.text: 「俺の陰謀団から逃亡した者を追跡しなければならないと話したよな…共に宴をするなら小さな代償だと思っていたんだが」{n}マラズハイの目は鋭くなる。{/n}「俺はお前にすべてを捧げたが、お前は何もくれやしない」
languages.original_text: "I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の陰謀団から逃亡した者を追跡しなければならないと話したよな…共に宴をするなら小さな代償だと思っていたんだが」{n}マラズハイの目は鋭くなる。{/n}「俺はお前にすべてを捧げたが、お前は何もくれやしない」

languages.text: «Te dije que debía seguir el rastro de los fugitivos de mi kábala... Creí que sería un pequeño precio a pagar por el privilegio de agasajarnos juntos con el festín». {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Te lo ofrecí todo, y tú no me diste nada a cambio».
languages.original_text: "I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."

traits.locale_text: «Te dije que debía seguir el rastro de los fugitivos de mi kábala... Creí que sería un pequeño precio a pagar por el privilegio de agasajarnos juntos con el festín». {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Te lo ofrecí todo, y tú no me diste nada a cambio».

languages.text: « Je vous ai dit que je devais traquer les fugitifs de ma Kabale... Un faible prix à payer pour avoir le privilège de festoyer avec moi, {n}dit Marazhai en plissant les yeux.{/n} Je vous ai tout donné, sans jamais rien recevoir en échange. »
languages.original_text: "I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai dit que je devais traquer les fugitifs de ma Kabale... Un faible prix à payer pour avoir le privilège de festoyer avec moi, {n}dit Marazhai en plissant les yeux.{/n} Je vous ai tout donné, sans jamais rien recevoir en échange. »

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch aufgetragen, die Flüchtigen meiner Kabale aufzuspüren ... Ein geringer Preis für das Privileg, Euch auf ein Fest mit mir zu begeben, wie ich finde." {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ich habe Euch alles angeboten und Ihr habt mir nichts zurückgegeben."
languages.original_text: "I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch aufgetragen, die Flüchtigen meiner Kabale aufzuspüren ... Ein geringer Preis für das Privileg, Euch auf ein Fest mit mir zu begeben, wie ich finde." {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ich habe Euch alles angeboten und Ihr habt mir nichts zurückgegeben."

languages.text: "Sana Kabalımın kaçaklarının peşine düşmem gerektiğini söylemiştim... Bunu, benimle ziyafetin tadını çıkarma ayrıcalığı için küçük bir bedel olarak gördün." {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Sana her şeyi sundum, sense bana hiçbir şey vermedin."
languages.original_text: "I told you I needed to track down the fugitives of my Kabal... A small price to pay for the privilege of feasting with me, I thought." {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "I offered you everything, and you gave me nothing."

traits.locale_text: "Sana Kabal'ımın kaçaklarının peşine düşmem gerektiğini söylemiştim... Bunu benimle ziyafetin tadını çıkarma ayrıcalığı için küçük bir bedel olarak görmüştüm." {n}Marazhai, gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Sana her şeyi sundum, sense bana hiçbir şey vermedin."
